mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, created_date AS createdDate, updated_date AS updatedDate, user_id AS userId, img_url AS imgUrl, like_count AS likeCount, view_count AS viewCount FROM board WHERE id = #{boardId} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT id, title, content, created_date AS createdDate, updated_date AS updatedDate, user_id AS userId, img_url AS imgUrl, like_count AS likeCount, view_count AS viewCount FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(board ${criteria.sorted}) */ rownum AS rn, id, title, content, created_date, updated_date, user_id, img_url, like_count, view_count FROM board WHERE board_category_id = #{criteria.selectId} AND rownum <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.pageSize} ) WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.pageSize}
